channel.title: [help][PI][paying] Items disappear upon banking [help][PI][paying]
channel.description:
Add me on skype: [b]gooni.hatter[/b] for payment inquiries and further help
Items disappear when banking. For example, if I bank an item, it would disappear - pretty fucked up right?
How do I fix this?
What java file do I have to refer to?
I can't find any other posts like this either. Please help. BTW I have the new bank interface with the tabs. When I deposit all, the items don't disappear, when I just click on the item with the bank interface open, the item disappears . Therefore, when I bank an item without the tabs, the item disappears.
UPDATE: So is Bank5.java Im supposed to modify? How about RemoveItem.java?
[b]UPDATE: SOLVED, THANKS FOR TRYING FOLKS :D[/b]

item.title: [help][PI][paying] Items disappear upon banking [help][PI][paying]

item.description:
@JackIN wrote:

Add me on skype: gooni.hatter for payment inquiries and further help

Items disappear when banking. For example, if I bank an item, it would disappear - pretty fucked up right?

How do I fix this?

What java file do I have to refer to?

I can’t find any other posts like this either. Please help. BTW I have the new bank interface with the tabs. When I deposit all, the items don’t disappear, when I just click on the item with the bank interface open, the item disappears . Therefore, when I bank an item without the tabs, the item disappears.

UPDATE: So is Bank5.java Im supposed to modify? How about RemoveItem.java?

UPDATE: SOLVED, THANKS FOR TRYING FOLKS
